official_title: A bill to establish within the Department of Housing and Urban Development a Special Assistant to the Secretary for Hispanic Programs.
subjects: Department of Housing and Urban Development

summary.text: Establishes within the Department of Housing and Urban Development a Special Assistant to the Secretary for Hispanic Programs. Sets forth the duties of the Special Assistant.

titles.title: A bill to establish within the Department of Housing and Urban Development a Special Assistant to the Secretary for Hispanic Programs.
